ygData.subject: Re: Giant fire beetle?
ygData.msgSnippet: I didn t see a mention of any legs. I had no idea that s what was desired. Belgarth  Wolfstrider ... _________________________________________________________
ygData.messageBody:
I didn't see a mention of any legs. I had no idea
that's what was desired.

Belgarth Wolfstrider

--- Marc Stone <mes5415@...> wrote:
> From: "Marc Stone" <mes5415@...>
>
> Well many have posted on this but sadly a few
> comments are wrong. Unless
> they changed this quest, a giant fire beetle leg
> comes from the Queen
> Klackniks. These can be found near Qeynos or
> Rivervale newbie areas. It is a
> rare spawn. It is quite tough for newbies though, i
> suggest at least level
> 10-12 before doing it if not higher. been a long
> time since I killed one.
>
> The beetles in karana are called Giant Beetles and
> DO NOT drop the items you
> are looking for.
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Doug Sorensen <belgarth_of_surefall@...>
> To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
> Sent: Monday, June 14, 1999 12:08 PM
> Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Giant fire beetle?
>
>
> >From: Doug Sorensen
> <belgarth_of_surefall@...>
> >
> >
> >I am pretty sure I saw giant fire beetles in one of
> >the Karena zones(East or West). I seem to recall
> they
> >were about level 10 or so, but it has been a long
> >while since I fought within that level.
> >
> >Belgarth Wolfstrider
> >
> >--- "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
> wrote:
> >> From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
> >>
> >> I don't think Giant Fire Beetles exist. Someone
> in
> >> my guild asked that and
> >> I've never seen em. I've seen Fire Beetles, and
> >> Giant Beetles, but not Giant
> >> Fire Beetles. If they do exist, it's on one of
> the
> >> outlying islands, not on
> >> the main continent (I've been everywhere but
> >> Cazith-Thule and the
> >> "evil-race" towns).
> >>
> >> -----Original Message-----
> >> From: ken satchell "flash-net & nikken
> distrubter"
> >> [mailto:ken4p@...]
> >> Sent: Monday, June 14, 1999 1:29 AM
> >> To: EQCheats; EQBrewers@onelist.com;
> >> EQ_Masters@onelist.com;
> >> EQ_Monk@onelist.com
> >> Subject: [EQCheats] Giant fire beetle?
> >>
> >>
> >> From: "ken satchell \"flash-net & nikken
> >> distrubter\"" <ken4p@...>
> >>
> >> Where do you find Giant fire beetle's and approx.
> >> what level are they?
> >> Ken
